EmailTemplate.subject: [Action Required]: Salesforce Check in at Davos
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To help ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Upon arrival at Davos, your health status documentation will need to be verified by Salesforce Safety Cloud at the Salesforce Welcome Center (81 Promenade, Davos Platz) in order to enter Salesforce event spaces. This is an essential step in supporting Safety as our #1 value for this event. Every step you take in our safety protocol goes a long way in keeping everyone safe. Required documentation includes:
* Proof of being Fully Vaccinated for Non-Salesforce Employees (including 3rd Dose / Booster After June 21, 2021) * Primary Test - Negative PCR test taken no longer than 72 hours before arrival in Davos, or a Negative professionally administered or observed antigen test taken no longer than 24 hours before arrival in Davos * Secondary Test - PCR taken at Welcome Center within 24hrs of arrival (Note: If you have tested positive for COVID-19 since April 11, your PCR may be replaced by a second antigen test) Questions? Stop by the Salesforce Welcome Center located at: 81 Promenade, Davos Platz * Monday - Tuesday from 6:30 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. CET * Wednesday from 6:30 a.m. - 11:59 p.m. CET
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
